General.Name: CF Acquisition Corp. VI
General.Description: Rumble Inc. operates video sharing platforms. The company operates rumble.com, a platform that enables video creators to host, livestream, manage, distribute, and create OTT feeds, as well as monetize their content. It also operates locals.com, a subscription-based video sharing platform. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Longboat Key, Florida.
General.Address: 444 Gulf of Mexico Drive, Longboat Key, FL, United States, 34228
